frontmatter.title: cs231n: Practical Machine Learning Project 2
frontmatter.description: Option 1. Image Captioning using RNN and LSTM.

frontmatter.title: 对zhwiki数据集进行LSI分析 (latent semantic indexing)
frontmatter.description: 在 zhwiki 数据集中取300篇文章作为数据集，进行LSI分析，借助python的gensim库使用tfidf

frontmatter.title: Use machine learning algorithm to predict whether an RNA sequence can form a circular RNA
frontmatter.description: In this problem, we are given reference genome of Homo sapiens and the genomic loci of all circRNAs. Given a certain genomic locus, our goal is to develop a classifier to predict whether a pair of two loci will form a circRNA or not

frontmatter.title: Color Transfer 实验
frontmatter.description: Color Transfer 是基于一阶统计特性的颜色迁移，可以将参考图像的颜色传输到目标图像。
